title: AI Partnership Proposal
subtitle: Custom AI Automation Systems for Small & Medium Businesses
problem: 15-28 hours of weekly administrative overhead, manual scheduling, dispatching, invoicing, and customer follow-ups consuming resources that should be focused on growth
key_technology: Custom agentic AI systems with multi-agent orchestration, integrated with existing business tools (ServiceTitan, Zoho, QuickBooks)
key_metric: 150-450% ROI within 3-6 months, 15-35 hours/week time savings, 3-19 week payback period
timeline: 8-24 weeks depending on partnership tier (Discovery: 8 weeks, Foundation: 12 weeks, Architect: 24 weeks)
budget_amount: $4,000 - $30,000 (3 tiers: AI Discovery $4,000, Foundation Builder $9,500, Systems Architect $30,000)
